text:
I was teaching today, and it stroke me that ConnectivityMeasure computes connectomes, and the name doesn't express this well. The "Measure" name doesn't capture the fact that it gives matrices, it feels more like a bivariate measure.

Not sure of a name? ConnectomeBuilder? ConnectomeEstimator?

Suggestions? Comments? Discussion?
title: Rename ConnectivityMeasure
clean_text: I teach today stroke connectivitymeasur comput connectom name doesnt express well the measur name doesnt captur fact give matric feel like bivari measur not sure name connectomebuild connectomeestim suggest comment discuss
